page.title: 04Sports in Oakley
page.content: Our school has a few sports in which our netball and football teams can compete against other schools.We also play rounders and chinese cricket.We play Brill,Ickford and Long Crendon.There are two mens football teams - first and second. There is also a mens' cricket team which plays on Saturdays and Sundays.They play on the village recreation ground which has two football pitches, cricket pitch and a play area.The football team consists of men that live in the village and a couple of dads from the school.Our school has a sports day every year and we have three teams, the red team,the blue and the green team.We get certificates for first prize at finals and a cup for the team with the most points.Green won in 1985.
